name: RazeTheWorld
tag_list: razetheworld, raze-the-world, gaming-website, pc-gaming, games, hardware, grapbhics-cards, cpu, gaming-community, gaming-forum, pc-forum, hardware-forum, raze, the, world, rtw
overview:
RazeTheWorld is an online PC gaming and hardware oriented blog and community.

The website was founded by Logan back in June of 2008, containing a blog where news is posted, and a forum consisting of thousands of users. Since then, the site has expanded exponentially, moving to other areas of entertainment, such as game events, live streaming, and online video.

RazeTheWorld features two groups of blogs. A main blog, where official writers maintain their standpoint on games or hardware, talk about current events, or post current news regarding the industry. RazeTheWorld also features a Community Blog, where any member of the community can voice their opinion in the form of a news article, blog, or rant.

RazeTheWorld utilizes youtube as a means of relaying additional news as and general wackiness to the masses on their channel. Most of the videos consist of news, gameplay videos of upcoming or newly released games for PC, or other general nonsense.

Part of what makes RazeTheWorld special is their intent to drift as far away from other gaming websites, making it a unique community, where users can voice their opinions and debate on different things in areas other websites fear to tread. The writing style of the authors often make the blogs or videos informative, yet fun and entertaining.

RazeTheWorld also features several game servers for PC games, hosting weekly or bi-weekly “events” in which members of the community put their skills to the test with site moderators and other community members in games like Team Fortress 2, and Counter Strike: Source.
